name: Lavandería Autoservicio Speed Queen
title: (39750) Lavandería Autoservicio Speed Queen
description: Laundry service, 2 machines of 8 kg, 2 machines of 14 kg. Pet dryers and machines too. Detergent included. Clean space. Snack vending machine. Few shops and bars nearby. Open every day from 9:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m.

title: (39750) Colindres - 7B Calle Ría del Asón
description: The place is a street where the market is held on Fridays, therefore that day you could not park. Beautiful sunsets. You can walk or bike to Laredo or San Martín beach.

name: Colada expres
title: (39750) Colada expres
description: Launderette, open daily from 09:00 to 22:00.

title: (39750) Colindres - 2B Calle Heliodoro Fernández
description: Drinking water source about 15m from the road.

title: (39750) Colindres - 26 Calle el Monte
description: Good place to spend the night with views of the colindres marshes, very quiet, they did not bother us all night, little or no vehicle traffic. A container to deposit rubbish nearby

title: (39750) Colindres - 38 Avenida de Europa
description: Good place to leave the motorhome. Spacious and five minutes from downtown.

title: (39750) Colindres - 29 Calle Zona del Puerto
description: Parking in the port area, very close to the town center with all kinds of shops and next to the service station. Also municipal swimming pool a few meters away.

title: (39750) Colindres - Avenida de Europa
description: Purpose parking for one night. Close to the river and the highway. Not quiet thanks to the nearby motorway, but not loud either.

name: Camping Playa del Regatón
title: (39770) Camping Playa del Regatón
description: Super nice 100% shaded campsite on foot ria new and super equipped bathrooms, all the plots with cespep and cobbled streets supermarket and restaurant without swimming pool there is a sink in all the plots barbecues in several good places to spend several days in town 10 mins walk. Dogs accepted.

title: (39750) Colindres - 45C Calle la Quinta
description: For a midday stop, but no more.

name: Camping Laredo
title: (39770) Camping Laredo
description:
Nice site and well laid out. Newly renovated showers and toilets blocks.
200m to the town and very nice promenade.
Old town nestled at the east of the promenade is well worth a visit. Narrow streets dotted with cafes and restaurants.

name: Camping Carlos V
title: (39770) Camping Carlos V
description: Camping Carlos V

title: (39770) Laredo - 5 Avenida Derechos Humanos
description: Street with little traffic at the end of the built-up area, next to a large and quiet park. There is usually enough space to park without problem. There is no parking ban, but it is a street, so you cannot camp. Less than 10 minutes walk from the beach and 3 minutes from some bars and restaurants. Some basic goods stores in the surroundings. 45 minutes walk from the center of Laredo, but there is a bus stop next door and a bike path on the seafront (5 min away)

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Avenida de Francia
description: Drinking water fountain with a very small trickle but it allows you to fill a few liters for troubleshooting.

title: (39770) Laredo - 44 Avenida de la Libertad
description: On the street next to a park

title: (39760) La Maza - 121A Barrio Treto
description: Parking in the city adjoining a shaded square. Pretty covered play area, water point.

title: (39770) Laredo - 5 Avenida los Derechos Humanos
description: Just for the night, no service, quiet place. Leave clean for the future.

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Calle Parque Público
description: Fairly flat gravel parking lot, very close to the beach, with a bike path on the promenade. Nearby there are bars and restaurants. On the promenade there are pay toilets. Showers at the beach access. There are always several motorhomes, although yesterday I saw that they leave a lot of unnecessary separation between them, preventing other vehicles from parking and, being such a requested place, it is poorly done. At this rate, they're going to ban it. Let's be more careful. Camping is not allowed, let's respect so that they respect us too!!!

title: (39770) Laredo - 5A Calle García Leániz
description: Next to the promenade and the beach. Very close to the Center. There are always several motorhomes parked.

title: (39770) Laredo - 60 Calle Parque Público
description: Water tap in a park with palm trees. A stone's throw from the beach

title: (39770) Laredo - 1047 Avenida Derechos Humanos
description: On the edge of the wooded park, calm and pleasant place.

title: (39770) Laredo - 16F Avenida Victoria
description: Located in a dead end, parking on the right side, several motorhomes, super quiet. the beach a few steps, shower.

title: (39770) Laredo - 35B Avenida Enrique Mowinkel
description: near the beach.

title: (39770) Laredo - 4 Calle Víctimas del Terrorismo
description: Street where to park and spend the night. Ice cream parlor next door, and churrería a few meters away. Next to the beach and the promenade

title: (39770) Laredo - 75 Avenida de Francia
description: Parking in grass field

title: (39770) Laredo - 2 Avenida de Cantabria
description: Street right next to the promenade to park day and night without problems.

title: (39760) Bárcena de Cicero - 20A Barrio Primosto
description: Perfect for an overnight stay or a stop on the way to eat. Next to the cemetery and with views of Colindres, Santoña, etc. site in height with a bit of noise from the cars on the highway. Quiet and pleasant place.

title: (39770) Laredo - 29 Avenida de Cantabria
description: Parking space along the beach at the edge of the sidewalk, no ban for the camper because no area made available by the city, however we remained discreet. Autonomy needed because only emptying possible: toilets in public. Downtown 300 m street cleaned every day. Beach beautiful damage to the buildings all around.

title: (39770) Laredo - 12 Calle Marqués de Valdecilla
description: Parking in a street in the city center, in front of the beach, very quiet, no problem for the night.

title: (39770) Laredo - 2 Parque Público II
description: Quiet area next to a park. Fountain in the park. Very quiet you can stay overnight without problems. We slept several motorhomes together. Beach 200 meters.

title: (39770) Laredo - 8A Calle Marqués de Comillas
description: Secured to spend a quiet night by the beach Stay discreet Downtown very close

title: (39790) Bárcena de Cicero - 15L Urbanización Cicero-Urbanización Pomares
title_short: (39790) Bárcena de Cicero - 15L Urbanización Cicero-Urbanización Pomares
description: Parking next to a playground with a fountain.

title: (39770) Laredo - 8 Calle Eguilior
description:
Self-service laundry from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. 365 days a year.
2 machines 12kg
1 16kg
detergent and fabric softener included in the price
3 dryers every 10 minutes.
very clean.
the boss is very nice and speaks a little French.

title: (39777) Laredo - 13 N-634
description: Space for 20 cars, there is usually room. Good views. Go to see it and evaluate spending the night.

title: (39791) Bárcena de Cicero - 15U Poblado Cicero, Calle El parque
title_short: (39791) Bárcena de Cicero - 15U Poblado Cicero, Calle El parque
description: Parking in the center of a village where to spend the night

title: (39770) Laredo - Avenida de Emilio Caprile Poloni
title_short: (39770) Laredo - Avenida de Emilio Caprile Poloni
description: Parking in the strut of laredo, there are plates forbidden to stay overnight, but in winter there is usually no problem parking. Practically in the sand of the beach with views, ideal to spend the day. And in case of problems overnight in the parking next door at 100m

title: (39749) Santoña - 19E Paseo Pereda
description: In winter, perfect parking for the night, but they already warned us that in summer it's crazy. Not a single car noise when we were there. Beautiful sunset and in the morning, the beginning of the routes through Mount Buciero is right next to it. We made it to the horse lighthouse (763 steps). Beautiful!

title: (39749) Santoña - 4 Paseo Pereda
description: Parking at the end of the Promenade. There is an area reserved for the disabled and a public toilet. Quiet street at night, but busy during the day with pedestrians going for a walk and vehicles going to the building ahead. There is a restaurant nearby. Access to the route to the Caballo lighthouse is just to the right of the stairs that go up to the battery.

title: (39740) Santoña - 27 Calle Almirante Carrero Blanco
description: A quiet place in the center of the town of Santoña.

title: (39740) Santoña - 2 Calle Tomás Palacios
description: laundromat

title: (39740) Santoña - 2 Calle San Miguel
description: Perfect parking to spend a night or visit Santoña, free

title: (39740) Santoña - 1 Calle Dársena
description: Near the arena today there were 10 motorhomes, I asked them and they told me that there is no problem to sleep

title: (39740) Santoña - Plaza Abastos
description: Full laundry. It has two large washers and three dryers. Cash payment with coins. The price depends on the minutes, and the correct amount must be paid. The place has chairs and tables, laundry buckets and a ceiling fan.

title: (39820) Limpias - 55 Calle Limpias
description: Tarmac parking in Limpias, nice for a break or visit the small town. Near the A8. Small river and departure hiking trail. Tall trees make a little shade. The night does not seem forbidden ... to see ...

title: (39740) Santoña - 33-35 Calle General Salinas
description: Outdoor parking between El Puerto and the center of Santona, Not specific to motorhomes

title: (39740) Santoña - 37 Calle General Salinas
description: Really nice place, in front of the beach and port, quiet and safe. Center town just 5 min by walk

title: (39777) Las Cárcobas - 9023B Diseminado Laredo
description: At the end of a small road which has become a path, at the crossroads, on the left it goes down, on the right it goes up. The square is sloping, quite a few cans of beers, but the view is magnificent over the bay of Laredo. Sunset for us all alone.

title: (39777) Laredo -
description: Site with very good views and level ground is located at the end of a well-groomed dirt road, it is a bit dirty but with the views it is worth it

title: (39740) Santoña - 21 Avenida de Lons
description: Very wide street with many places to park and a 5-minute walk from the town center and all the restaurants and seaport

title: (39795) Santoña - 5 Carretera Cicero
description: We have slept without problem, it is the hostel parking. I recommend

title: (39740) Santoña - 6 Calle Baldomero Villegas
description: CE COLADA EXPRESS

title: (39795) Escalante - CA-241
description: Water

title: (39740) Santoña - 36 Calle Baldomero Villegas
description: Parking of land and asphalt in the industrial area very well to visit Santoña, you can sleep without problem. The tank can be filled at the gas station for 2 euros.

title: (39740) Santoña - 4-6 Calle Juan Vella
description: Large flat parking, very close to the marina and the city. Very quiet to spend the night and / or spend the day.

title: (39740) Santoña - 52 Calle cabildo
description: Very quiet place by the sea. It is in a polygon and we spend the night day and night. we spent the night with 6 more caravans. in the morning people fishing but pretty quiet. Some car passes but getting up looking at the sea is worth it. at 5 o'clock two came talking to smoke a cigarette but it took them nothing to leave

title: (39740) Santoña - s/n Calle Sor María del Carmen
title_short: (39740) Santoña - s/n Calle Sor María del Carmen
description: Santoña parking in municipal swimming pool.

address.street: s/n Calle Sor María del Carmen

title: (39740) Santoña - 50A Calle Baldomero Villegas
description: This is a small green space in the polygon that serves as access to a small pier. Parking of 3 or 4 caravans and vans in the area of ​​the road.

title: (39740) Santoña -
description: Parking with wonderful views from where you can see a beautiful sunset. During the day quite a lot of traffic noise but at night it decreases and you can sleep peacefully. Next door begins a nice walk through the marshes and there is also a playground for dogs.

title: (39849) Ampuero - 48 Diseminado Marron
description: Public parking next to children's area. We had to find a place to sleep and we found this one. Very quiet and seems pretty safe.

title: (39776) Liendo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking next to San Julián beach

title: (39776) Villanueva -
description: Not far from a parking lot, quiet and flat place facing the sea

title: (39776) Liendo - 58C Barrio Iseca Vieja
description: Reading, 10 picnic tables to stop for lunch, sign prohibiting fire. Near a restaurant. Quiet place with shadows.

title: (39849) Ampuero - 17B Calle Doctor Antonio Ruiz Ruiz
title_short: (39849) Ampuero - 17B Calle Doctor Antonio Ruiz Ruiz
description: It is a parking lot next to the river in the village of Ampuero, near the municipal swimming pool and in a quiet area. Small vehicle only

title: (39776) Liendo - 4 Diseminado Villanueva
description: Picnic area next to the Errmita de San Julián, the Camino de Santiago passes that way too, there are a few places to park and a table, a quiet place, signs forbidden to stay overnight

title: (39795) Escalante - 5002 Barrio Escalante
description: Quiet place to sleep, we spent two days to take advantage of the cider party

title: (39740) Santoña - 1 Avenida Cuarta Avenida
description: Alternative to nearby places that already appear for this city but limited in height. Located in a quiet residential street, you can park online, knowing that you can continue as long as it does not disturb the neighbors and you do not unpack. There are several CAs and it is also close to the Civil Guard barracks. Without services

title: (39749) Santoña - 2C Lugar Barrio Dueso
description: Parking along the cemetery. Parking in the daytime car park next to it is not authorized but along the cemetery it is tolerated. Beach access, public toilets.

title: (39740) Santoña - 5 Carretera Faro Pescador
description: Picnic area next to the beach. good views and direct descent to the sand.

title: (39740) Santoña - 5 Carretera Santoña-Berria
description: Great place next to the beach. Even during the summer weekends, there was enough space for motorhomes. Not allowed to stay at night. Showers (150m) and toilets (250m) to the beach. Friendly atmosphere and great surf! Height limit 2.20m

name: Camping Playa de Berria
title: (39740) Camping Playa de Berria
description: Camping Playa de Berria

title: (39197) Cerecedas - 30B Barrio Cerecedas
description: Small public car park in very quiet residential area. Place very slightly sloping. Garbage containers nearby.

title: (39740) Santoña - 5 Carretera Faro Pescador
description: Cemetery car park (very quiet) overlooking the beach on one side, prison on the other... Altimeter limited to 2.20m and a priori to 5.50m long and 1.80m wide. Toilet, water and wifi at the campsite next door.

title: (39740) Santoña - 3 Carretera Faro Pescador
description: Place at the roadside in front of the access to the beach. Showers next door. Square suitable for motorhomes. The campsite next door is a little noisy (23 hours max) but then it's very quiet.

title: (39740) Santoña - 29E Avenida Tercera Avenida
description: Residential area, without services, but that allows it to be used for one night. Refrain all those who intend to take out tables and awnings ... I remember, residential area and very quiet and peaceful. The sea 2 minutes and countless surf schools. We saw no nearby stores, and only one open bar.

name: El Paraíso de Berria
title: (39740) El Paraíso de Berria
description: Private day parking at the foot of the Berria beach,  it has bathrooms with showers and they are quite good and with hot water.

title: (39197) Piedrahita - CA-141
description: Large esplanade. Santoña town hall car park. We will not sleep. Resting and eating with the noise of the road but plenty of space.

title: (39740) Santoña - 25 Avenida de Berria Primera Avenida
title_short: (39740) Santoña - 25 Avenida de Berria Primera Avenida
description: Public parking. nearly to Berria beach and cycle line direction Santona. we spent here two days and nights without problems. we started also from here to visit faro Caballo, (through prisons road)

title: (39197) Santoña - 41 Avenida Berria Tercera
description: Quiet place, I was parked for a week surfing on the beach which is a 3 minute walk away.

title: (39791) Bárcena de Cicero - 28 Diseminado Moncalian
description: Small place in the forest right on the path. Enough for a van. Spent a quiet night here. We only met a walker.

title: (39776) - 237 Diseminado Isequilla
description: Open space on the road, next to the path that leads to the cliff, quiet but next to the houses of the village

title: (39776) Liendo - N-634
description: Picnic area near Liendo. With tables and trees. There is shade depending on the time of day and a gazebo nearby. Good place to spend the night even if it is not too flat

title: (39197) Argoños - Calle Joaquín Ferna
description: Quiet area with little lighting at night, no services, nearby children's park and little traffic. ideal for the night.

title: (39791) Bárcena de Cicero - 3 CA-672
description: Gas station with a rest stop "la Pausa" next door with clean toilets and a small shop.

title: (39849) Ampuero - 4 Barrio la Bien Aparecida
description: Parking day and night. Sanctuary public baths not far away.

title: (39180) Noja - 1075 Paseo del Brusco
description: Dog beach, limit 2.0 m. Here you have a separate area at the end of the beach where dogs can move freely. It has a restaurant, a cafe, a small supermarket and also a bakery before the height limit. There is plenty of space to park, but camping is not allowed. We slept in front of the height limit on a parking lot and didn't bother anyone, it has beach showers in the spots where dogs are not allowed. The police often drive by to check things out, so we definitely wouldn't recommend camping.

title: (39791) Bárcena de Cicero - 91 Diseminado Ambrosero
description: Faucet with water on a place for some local spoert, next to a small church/chapel.

title: (39180) Noja - 1057 Paseo del Brusco
description: Sea views. First line beach. Luxury. Sign forbidden camping, tents, etc ... But if you don't take anything out, no problem. Sea and calm.

name: Aparcamiento de autocaravanas
title: (39716) Aparcamiento de autocaravanas
description: Parking very safe and quiet. Ideal for overnight. Nice views. 10 km. from the beaches of Noja and Santoña, and just over 1 km. from the A-8 motorway. 2 km. of Gama and Beranga gas stations. Bilbao-Santander A8 motorway, exit 184 towards Beranga-Noja-Isla. Afterwards, continue on the N634 towards Ambrosero. A little more than 1 km. cross to the left where there is a sign indicating the air. Languages ​​spoken: English, Spanish and French

title: (39764) Secadura - 85 Lugar Barrio Secadura
description: Beautiful picnic spot, no services, by the side of a river, no signage,  several picnic tables and BBQ. stunning views around

title: (39193) Arnuero - 27 Diseminado la Rota
description: Unclear whether it is drinking water, but water with a hard jet. You cannot connect a hose. We used it for our water filter.

title: (39776) Liendo - N-634
description: Picnic area next to the N-634 highway towards Castro Urdiales-Santander, with 4 picnic tables. The A-8 motorway runs alongside and can generate noise at night. Flat and smooth parking space. I imagine it could be a place to sleep, we just stop to eat and rest.

title: (39193) Escalante - 7 Barrio Alvareo
description: Laundry for picnic ideal

title: (39849) Solamaza - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to park but only accessible with a 4x4 vehicle. We went with a big van so not only restricted to small 4x4. Nice for spending the night. Flat surface, enough for 2 or 3 vehicle maybe. Do not know if this place is allowed so at your own risk and choice.

title: (39798) Sonabia - 42 Lugar Barrio Sonabia
description:
Camping forbidden! 

A path that leads to the end of a rocky point overlooking a small beach on one side, the ocean as far as the eye can see on the other side. Magnificent place, popular with surfers. You can park at the bar or along the dirt road. The top. ⚠️Limited to 5.5T⚠️

name: Área autocaravanas Arnuero
title: (39193) Área autocaravanas Arnuero
description:
Motorhome area, next to the road, parking and services.
A payment system and restricted access to the registration and payment of vehicles and users have been put in place.

The area is designed as a legal overnight space for motorhomes, and includes the service of draining and refilling water. This service is not offered apart from overnight parking.

title: (39180) - 1001 Diseminado Helgueras
description: Large open field in an old campsite, behind the custom bar, signs that dogs are not allowed to roam on the beach and warnings that there may be penalties of 40 euros per m2 camper van. Keep the place clean! Costas fines should arrive at your home, we are told in the pub, Noja town hall is not the one to impose fines on you, because the municipal ones don't even appear in this area without a law.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 92B Barrio Sonabia
description: Very restricted parking. Good to park during the day, but at night you can no longer spend the night. At the entrance of the town they have put a galibo that limits the entrance of motorhomes and campers of more than 2 metres high. ⚠️Very busy on weekends and summer months. ⚠️

title: (39180) Noja - 18 Paseo Trengandín
description: Places next to the stadium. Water at the fountain. Public WC at the end of the avenue.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 72F Barrio Sonabia
description:
Fontaine publique.
Il y a aussi des poubelles à côté.

name: Camping Oriñón
title: (39798) Camping Oriñón
description: Camping Oriñon. Camping designed more for caravans parked all summer.

title: (39798) Oriñón - 1029 Barrio Oriñón
description: It is a phenomenal place, at the entrance it is clearly indicated that you cannot stay overnight. There are toilets and showers. It is easily accessible.

title: (39193) Castillo Siete Villas - 54B Barrio Castillo
description: Drinking water fountain located next to a small play park. Push button type.

title: (39180) Noja - 14 Paseo de Trengandín
description: Very quiet place on the beach out of season (free parking out of season). We stayed with no problems. It is next to a road. A few meters public and clean toilets. There are public showers a few meters away that work during the summer. I imagine that in summer it will be more regulated.

title: (39798) Oriñón - 1123 Barrio Oriñón
description: Wide and quiet place. Free less than 50m from the beach. Small shop with bakery 20m away, a few bars. No drain or water fill area. Swing and fountain nearby. ⚠️Limited 5.5T⚠️

title: (39849) Regada -
description: Nice place near a very quiet road, around 50 meters. There is a little hill accessible with a van and then you,are surrounded by the nature. Nice place for the night.

title: (39192) San Mamés de Meruelo - s/n Barrio los Berezales
title_short: (39192) San Mamés de Meruelo - s/n Barrio los Berezales
description: Gas station with drinking water gray water discharge and free air

title: (39192) San Mamés de Meruelo - 17 CA-147
description: Drinking water fountain next to the road

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 51B Barrio Oriñón
description: Parking with one-way access. Enter Orinon and follow the one-way street. For vans because limited to 2 m, large space. During the day there are cars of people going to the beach. Possibility of parking in the street along the parking lot to spend the night.

title: (39788) Rioseco - 23 Lugar Barrio Tresagua
description: Beautiful quiet spot by the river. only suitable for one van as very local area with limited space. would recommend only one night stay. drinking fountain nearby and beautiful views of river. there is also a deeper spot to swim in river if you walk downstream past next bridge and clamber down bank. friendly locals.

title: (39798) Islares - 61 N-634
description: At the side of the road a parking lot with a beautiful view of the beach and the sea where we stopped to eat. nice!

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 82-74 N-634
description: Site on the side of the road with picnic tables surrounded by greenery to stop to rest and eat, you can hear the road.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales \ Islares - 59 N-634
description:
Free parking right on the beach. Several restaurants in the immediate vicinity. Very quiet night. There are picnic benches. 2 meter restriction.
 Impressive place to spend the night quietly by the sea. Only one downside: not enough parking space. This weekend they were putting height limitation to 2.20 at the end, even so some place is left for cars.
There is a small campsite and at the entrance there is a supermarket and restaurant where you can use the toilet. The shower is the same as the beach, enough to remove the salt. The big beach at low tide is ideal for surfers and kids. And the small beach is great for looking for bugs, sneaking into the caves that discover the low tide and throw the ball to the dog. At playamar snorkeling and diving.  There is also a playground for children strategically located so that you can control them from the terrace!

title: (39738) Solórzano - 74 Diseminado Solorz
description: Parking in a municipal recreation area, with water and space for barbecue. Quiet to sleep.

title: (39180) Noja - 9 Avenida Ris
description: Self-service laundry

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 59 N-634
description: Nice place, overlooking the sea. Parking away from the noise of the beach but close to it. Access with a dog on the beach of the port but not on the sandy cove. Highly recommended.

title: (39738) Solórzano - 59 Barrio la Puente
description: Parking opposite the town hall with a few large spaces for AC. Ideal to visit the town or make a tactical stop. We have only parked during the day, we have not spent the night. Although the road is next to it, it seems a very quiet place.

name: Camping Playa Arenillas
title: (39798) Camping Playa Arenillas
description: Great campsite with very clean, modern sanitary facilities. Just a few meters to the beach. Restaurant and bar all on site.

title: (39788) Cantabria - 2 Barrio Rioseco
description: Outside the DIA supermarket there is a gravel parking lot, and next to it several tables for picnics, in a pleasant park. There is a fountain, although it cannot be reached by vehicle, and garbage and recycling containers. I saw no signs prohibiting overnight stays. We only stop to shop and rest for a while. Access is easy with a motorhome.

title: (39788) Guriezo - 6B Barrio Rioseco
description: Gravel parking lot at a church. The parking lot is higher up in the trees. It is very quiet and pleasant ç. The bells only ring every half hour :-) There are no facilities, not even a trash can. So take your waste with you and respect nature. Please keep it clean.

name: Bidaivan Camper Park
title: (39788) Bidaivan Camper Park
description: Totally new area with all services. 4 minutes walk from the city center. Opening hours: Monday to Sunday: 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Bus from Guriezo to Castro Urdiales.

title: (39788) El Puente - 11 Barrio el Puente
description: Large parking lot with grass, we spent a very quiet night there, trade nearby, delicious Neno restaurant, small stream and walk nearby

name: CAMPING ARGOS
title: (39180) CAMPING ARGOS
description: Noja, 53 Avenida Ris. Camping Argos

title: (39798) Islares - 48B Lugar Barrio Islares
description: Simply a place to park and spend the night. Suitable when you have a pet since the nearby campsite does not allow our furry ones. Beach with natural pool 5 minutes on foot. No services.

title: (39798) Castro Urdiales - 47-55 N-634
description: Day and night parking allowed, restaurant with the best fish soup along the coast and inland.

title: (39180) Noja - 60 Calle Los Pinares
description: Online parking next to a park. Very good option during the day, we were able to take tables and chairs and it was common in the park. At night we slept without problems, but without unfolding an awning or opening windows. Next to 3 cafes / restaurants where we had breakfast.

title: (39860) Rasines - 1754 Barrio Rasines
description: Large green area with picnic area. No prohibition sign. Many people the day but no one at night.

title: (39180) Noja - 4 Calle la Sierra
description: Blue zone battery parking 5.30 euros all day long spaces for motorhomes next to a park with a beach bar and drinking water very close to the beach

title: (39180) Noja - 7 Avenida Santos Mártires
description: Parking in the street with a drinking water tap 2m from the parking spaces. Ideal for refueling

name: Camping Playa de Ris - Noja
title: (39180) Camping Playa de Ris - Noja
description: Camping playa de ris, Noja, family camping, near beach. Comfort assured. Sanitary clean. Simple and effective home. A bit expensive But adequate place to visit Bilbao, Bermeo, Santander etc .... rather for vans

title: (39180) Noja - 11 Calle Castrejón
description: There were many places where there was a bit of noise from passers-by

name: Camping Los molinos
title: (39180) Camping Los molinos
description: Campsite "Los molinos". Friendly welcome, speaks a little French. Sanitary clean but not all recent, very hot showers, pleasant. Large pitch for a motorhome, quiet in August. Swimming pool not extraordinary, wearing a mandatory cap. Karting. Average value for money. On the other hand, 500 m from a magnificent beach (Isla Playa) with breathtaking coves!

title: (39180) Noja - 7 Calle la Sierra
description: Good place, but very sloping ground.

title: (39788) Balbacienta - 18 Barrio Balbacienta
description: Water fountain

title: (39180) Noja - 1013 Calle de la Ría
description: Grass parking next to the campsite, free, pay attention to sandy areas. Near the beach. No service. A bit noisy at night with the evenings of the campsite.

name: Camping Playa Joyel
title: (39180) Camping Playa Joyel
description: Noja, 1021 Calle de la Ría. Camping Playa Joyel. Dogs not accepted!

title: (39195) Arnuero - 5 Barrio Arnuero-Palacio
description: Watertap

title: (39195) Arnuero - 116 CA-449
description: Starting point for a walk by natural busy road but practical for one night in the evening traffic stops about ten places no height limit

title: (39195) Arnuero - 116 CA-449
description: Next to the road but without any problem to spend the night

title: (39195) Arnuero - 61 Avenida Juan Hormaechea Cazón
description: Outdoor parking with spectacular views to the sea, which is just few meters away. The parking is between two beaches and despite charging if you enter after 21:00 (more or less) overnight will be free. Barrier to 2 meter!

title: (39195) Arnuero - 1 Avenida Juan Hormaechea Cazón
description: Water point next to the playground

title: (39195) Isla - 108 Barrio Isla
description: Parking with several spaces, between Isla Playa and Isla Pueblo. very quiet place

title: (39730) Hazas de Cesto - 7 Diseminado Praves
description: Shady place next to a hermitage with picnic tables and barbecues.

title: (39195) Arnuero - 94E Avenida Juan Hormaechea Cazón
description: Playa spectacular views of the island. Small vehicles only

title: (39788) Ranero -
description: Beautiful quiet place in the eucalyptus forest. Just a few minutes (800m) from the main road. Plenty of space for caravans.

name: Camping Playa de Isla
title: (39195) Camping Playa de Isla
description: Located directly on the sea. Pitches relatively small and cramped. direct access to the beach, the village and path along the cliffs

title: (39798) Islares - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful grassy spot with views. Road is a bit rough. Can be done in 2 wheel drive van. Has some picnic benches too. Plenty of shade. Access via tar road CA-520.

title: (39809) Gibaja - 72B Barrio la Quintana
description: Quiet parking to make a stop on the way and eat good quality and quantity in the Casa Pardo restaurant, you can only hear some sheep from a distance and with a stream nearby to refresh your feet

title: (39195) Arnuero - 24 Barrio Calleja
description: Nice views of the town, quiet place with room for two or three vans. We have spent the night without problem. The bad part is that it is not completely clean (at least when we went) and that there is a repeater next to it that spoils the 'natural space' a bit.

title: (39195) Arnuero - 26C Barrio Calleja
description: Space in the grass at the edge of the road as flat. No passing of cars at night because of the country road. No housing nearby, just cows. Seen exceptional on the whole coast. A few cars pass in the evening until 10 p.m., we were not told anything. The sunrise in the morning over the sea is exceptional.

title: (39195) Isla - 53 Barrio Isla
description: Free parking of the parish. flat, protected, free and without services. Perfect for the night and very very quiet.

title: (39195) Isla - 53 Barrio Isla
description: Tap with drinking water next to the Isla Church

title: (39794) Cantabria - Autovía del Cantábrico
description: Space for draining black and grey waste. Has a tap for water which comes out of broken taps which have no thread meaning that you will not be able to use a hosepipe. The water is not drinkable, comes out slow and you will only be able to fill bottles/buckets. Follow the signs into the picnic area and the services area is past the motorhome/caravan parking on the left just before you rejoin the motorway.  The caravan parking is very close to the motorway to so is very noisy so an overnight stay could be uncomfortable.

title: (39812) - 3113 Barrio Ogarrio
description: Place for a single van with beautiful views and tranquility. Little slope.

title: (39195) Arnuero -
description: Incredible place to spend next to the estuary. It is very easy to access. It is prairie. Very flat. Very quiet place and very close to the town of Ajo with all the amenities.

title: (39794) - 60 Diseminado Hoz
description: Nice parking next to the fast Road - day and night with a free service for camper. Great place to rest and stay for night. Parking dedicated for camping cars and cars with trailors. Toilets (8h30-18h), bins, playground, picnick places, dogs friendly.

title: (39812) Matienzo - CA-266
description: Place on the col: "Puerto de la Cruz Uzano at the statue of the cyclist. Nice view of the gray rocks.

title: (39195) Isla -
description: Splendid view, hiking trails all around. Place only for one vehicle.

name: Camping Los Molinos de Bareyo
title: (39170) Camping Los Molinos de Bareyo
description: Bareyo, 953 CA-447. Camping Los Molinos de Bareyo

title: (39788) Ranero -
description: A spot for vans only in the middle of nature with a view of the surrounding mountains. Access from the Alto de la Granja, by taking the motorable road (pebbles, uphill access without problem) leading to the barn where another less pleasant fallback spot is there (lots of traffic in the evening). very beautiful sunset from the barn. We saw lots of mountain biking in the morning and gravel. Very calm night, next to the cows. No services. Place flat for 1 or 2 vans max.

title: (39809) Ramales de la Victoria - 22 Diseminado Veares
title_short: (39809) Ramales de la Victoria - 22 Diseminado Veares
description: Parking by the river. It has a restaurant next door and garbage cans. Quiet and little frequented place. We spent the night without problem. Different access points to the river and a bike path (and pedestrian path) that leads to the center of town. It has swimming pools and green areas nearby.

title: (39195) Arnuero - Barrio Estorriguera
description: A beautiful place on the edge of the ria de ajo. Uncrowded. Possible to stay overnight. Walks to do around, possibility of renting a canoe, pretty little beaches that you discover when the tide goes down, small natural pools for children .... great restaurant opposite: Asador

name: Camping Punta Marina
title: (39195) Camping Punta Marina
description: Lovely camping Place in top of a hill. Nice view to the ocean. 6 euro per person and 13.50 for a car. big area for tents and campers with no electicity

title: (39195) Arnuero - Barrio Gracedo
description: Small parking lot at a pasture

title: (39809) - 1087 Barrio Ramales
description: Green area next to the football field with tables, swings, fountains, summer pool and greenway to the village (1.5 km). There is also the Ason river next to the beach to bathe in summer. Quite a lot of parking areas and there is a bar / grill at the entrance. Quiet zone.

title: (39788) - Unnamed Road
description: Small cover over the dam rather fat ground to avoid in time of pluit. .. 4x4 access only close to a perfect wood to escape in nature

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 21 Calle Mies Vena
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 21 Calle Mies Vena
description: Lovely elongated picnic area along the Rio Ranós about 5 km outside Ramales de la Victoria. During the weekends, when the weather is nice, it is very busy with day people. otherwise quiet especially at night. water taps available.

name: Camping Playa la Arena
title: (39195) Camping Playa la Arena
description: , 91 Barrio Isla. Campsite "Playa La Arena" by the sea, site with beautiful views. Camping without emptying gray water.

title: (39809) Ramales de la Victoria - 127 Barrio Helguero
title_short: (39809) Ramales de la Victoria - 127 Barrio Helguero
description: Large car park with picnic area and restaurant bar next to the Ason River

title: (39195) Arnuero - 16C Barrio la Arena
description: Wide parking spaces. It has no supply or disposal. Super quiet for sleeping. There are showers and toilets (with a schedule) on the beach. Nearby there is an exit that leads to the beach, many street dogs. There is also a nudist area. The baker will pass in the morning. There are bars and chiringuitos. The local police told us that because of the size of the cars, we should park so close to the tree line.

title: (39195) Cantabria - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking with easy access to the beaches, one of which allows dogs and is sandy. Several bars and restaurants in the area.

title: (39170) Bareyo - 241 Calle Socamino
description: Small car park in the middle of the village. Very calm night!

title: (39195) - 87 Barrio Isla
description: Parking on the descent to the nudist and dog beach, very quiet place, in the middle of the season we have been sleeping alone for 2 days,

title: (39812) Cantabria - 108 Barrio la Vía
description:
Roadside parking, very little traffic, a little incline. Drinking water.
Access to the river for bathing.
Lawn for sunbathing or having a snack.

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 9 Calle de La Dama Roja
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 9 Calle de La Dama Roja
description: City car park, paved and lighted, very close to the city and shops nearby. Easy access Free

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 12 Carretera de Guardamino
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 12 Carretera de Guardamino
description: Quiet place but with a lot of mud, ideal for doing the via ferrata of Callejomadero that visits the impressive Torcal of the area

name: Camping Ramales
title: (39809) Camping Ramales
description: Ramales of Victoria, 9A Barrio Helguero. Camping Barguilla, super sanitary campground and shower very clean awesome for a few days

title: (39170) Bareyo - 31M Barrio Ajo-Mies Ampudia
description: A good place, park for children, quiet, near the shopping center

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 10 Calle Práxedes Porres
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 10 Calle Práxedes Porres
description: Praxedes Porres Galan Street

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 14A Calle Trefilería
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 14A Calle Trefilería
description: Parking in the center of town with about 15 spaces

title: (39170) Ajo - 785 Avenida Benedicto Ruiz
description: Self-service laundry, has a dryer and change.

title: (48890) Karrantza Harana - 6F Lugar Barrio Ranero
description: Big parking at the Cuevas Pozalaguas with superb view and wonderful nature park for hiking. Very quiet during the night, some birds in the morning and eventually a Ranger showing by, that's all. The caves can be visited with a guided tour in Spanish but come with an English translation. Guide. The caves have a steady temperature of 13°C, so dress properly.

title: (39170) Bareyo - 1235 Calle La Ojerada
description: Large parking lot at Cabo de Ajo, near the lighthouse.

name: Camping CABO DE AJO
title: (39170) Camping CABO DE AJO
description: Camping site on a slope and with tall grass.

title: (39170) Bareyo - 2318 Avenida del Faro
description: Place to park AC of 7 meters and see the Faro de Ajo and the Ojerada.

title: (39170) Bareyo - 67 Barrio la Playa
description: Very quiet place to spend the night. limited to 2 meters and a few caravans were left outside just opposite is the beach parking with fountain showers and bathrooms we were in September 2018 to repeat

title: (39170) Bareyo - 34 Barrio la Playa
description: Cuberris Cabo de Ajo beach. No Camping!

title: (39170) Bareyo - 67 Barrio la Playa
description: Nice parking lot right on the beach. However, only for vehicles UP TO 2M. Shops can be reached in about 1km, beach showers and toilets available in summer. Right next to a beach bar. Spent 3 days & nights here and never had any problems??. If there are problems, there is a campsite next door.

name: Camping de Castro
title: (39700) Camping de Castro
description:
Castro Urdiales, 66 Barrio Allendelagua.
Camping de Castro, above the bullring of Castro Urdiales well indicated from the bullring, small path to get there, good reception, you have to hold steep terrain.

name: Camping Playa de Ajo
title: (39170) Camping Playa de Ajo
description: Camping Playa de Ajo

title: (39170) Ajo - 1301 Calle la Bandera
description: Unrestricted beach parking. Possibility to sleep. Bar 2m, so only for converted van. Beach showers and water fountain. Good surf spot

title: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 25 Barrio el Mazo
title_short: (39800) Ramales de la Victoria - 25 Barrio el Mazo
description: Viewpoint of covalanas. Great place to spend the night in the middle of nature we spend the night there in the parking of the covalana cave, 100 meters down the road there is a viewpoint with tables and benches. Very quiet place in the middle of nature.

title: (39794) Hoz de Anero - 5D Barrio la Iglesia
title_short: (39794) Hoz de Anero - 5D Barrio la Iglesia
description: Quiet place behind the town hall, peaceful village to walk around, a bar opposite the station, with a fountain.

title: (39700) Castro-Urdiales - 63 Barrio Allendelagua
description: Parking in adventure park. Ideal area to spend the day and visit Castro Urdiales and surroundings. Go to the beach, mountains...etc. Adventure activities.

title: (39794) Anero - 7A Barrio la Sota
description: Petrol station with possibility of filling water because at the service area just before on the expressway, you can empty but not fill.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 31 Calle de Silvestre Ochoa
title_short: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 31 Calle de Silvestre Ochoa
description: Be careful not to occupy the bus seats, if they call the police they fine you, use the other parking spaces. In Castro you can park and sleep anywhere, as long as you pay for the blue or red zone, I recommend going to the seafront, you park on the right, one-way street, quiet area, and two minutes from downtown, but remember to pay for parking, if there are machines you pay

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - 16D Barrio Urdiales
description: Parking in front of the cemetery and the green cliff area where you can walk. Toilets inside and a tap of water. A very quiet place. You can walk along the ocean with great views till the town.

title: (39700) Castro Urdiales - Avenida Alfonso VIII
description: We spent here one night because the car park next door was full, we saw this esplanade and there were only 3 cars; when we got up around 10 o'clock, there were more cars because the entire city is a blue zone, and we can park in this area because it is already a little on the outskirts of buildings and streets without issues.

title: (39813) Arredondo - 4 Barrio Lastredo
description: Quiet place next to the pharmacy and the Church of Arredondo. We had a great night by the river.

title: (39813) Arredondo - 8 Calle Atalaya
description: Large car park (7 places for motorhomes, the rest is small, quite sloping) free in the city center, difficult access for large vehicles. Services in town (shop, bars, pharmacy). Next to the Collados del Asón Natural Park. Thanks to the town hall for the service.

title: (39813) Arredondo - 11 Calle Gutierrez Solana
description: On the edge of the river and next to the road with little traffic, no services. good place to stop for lunch.
